oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: al-Zīb (Palestine); Child mortality; Dietary practices; Education; Family structure; Land ownership; Land sale; Orchards; Palestinian-Jewish relations; Polygamy; Pre-Nakba geographical territories; Qurʼānic teaching; Routes; Rural life; Schools; Siblings; al-Zīb (Palestine); Atrocities of war; Economic conditions; Expulsion; Family reunification; Fathers; Frustration; Grandmothers; Guards; Gunshots; Helpfulness; Honor; Horses; House rent; Mass murder; Military superiority; Mines; Nahalal (Jewish settlement: Palestine); Poets; Psychological warfare; Qānā (Lebanon); Refugee experience; Terrorism; Vehicles; Water resources; Weapons; Wedding customs; Work; Zionist Invasion of Palestine, 1948; ʻAtābā; al-Baṣṣ (Palestinian refugee camp: Lebanon); al-Zīb (Palestine); Arranged marriage; Border crossing; Cost of living; Death; Embroidery; Fathers; Home demolition; Hope; Illness; Nostalgia; Orchards; Pre-Nakba life; Refugee camp conditions; Return; Smuggling; Social relations; Vandalism; Vows; Water resources; Work; ʻAyn al-Ḥilwah (Palestinian refugee camp: Lebanon)
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on April 7, 1997 with Ᾱminah al-Ḥusayn, female, born in 1936 in al-Zīb, Palestine and resides in ʻAyn al-Ḥilwah Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع آمنة الحسين في 7 نيسان أبريل عام 1997، أنثى، ولدت عام 1936 في الذيب، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم عين الحلوة للاجئين الفلسطنيين، لبنان.
